headline: Visa CEO on economic slowdown, new stablecoin deal, and AI agents that shop for you
summary: Visa CEO Ryan McInerney shares his perspective on more cautious consumers, a new stablecoin deal, and efforts to support AI agent shopping.

headline: Morgan Stanley Sustainable Signals: Individual Investors Continue to Show High Levels of Interest in Sustainable Investing in New Survey
summary: NEW YORK, April 30, 2025--Individual investor interest in sustainability remains strong and stable, according to a new "Sustainable Signals" report by the Morgan Stanley Institute for Sustainable Investing. The survey polled 1,765 active individual investors with more than $100,000 in investable assets across North America, Europe and Asia Pacific (APAC) between February and March of this year to assess attitudes toward sustainable investing and where investors see the greatest opportunities and

headline: Morgan Stanley Investment Management Extends Availability of Institutional Private Equity to Individual Investors
summary: NEW YORK, April 30, 2025--Morgan Stanley Investment Management (MSIM) announced today the launch of the North Haven Private Assets Fund (NHPAF), an SEC-registered evergreen investment fund designed to offer select investors the opportunity to obtain institutional-quality private equity exposure primarily through co-investments and secondaries in the lower middle market. headline: Wall Street banks finally rid themselves of Elon Musk's X debt
summary: Wall Street banks on Monday finally got rid of the debt tied to Elon Musk’s 2022 buyout of Twitter. Investors purchased the remaining $1.2 billion in loans this week for roughly $0.98 on the dollar.

raw.headline: Wall Street banks finally rid themselves of Elon Musk's X debt

headline: M&A is slowing in US but accelerating worldwide during new Trump era
summary: US M&A is having its slowest start to a year since 2023, while deal volume outside the US soars to its best result since 2022.
